name: Yatzy Challenge
description:
Yatzy Challenge is a combination of the games Single Yatzy, Double Yatzy, and Triple Yatzy. The challenge is to win all three, in order, against the computer opponents.

If you win Single Yatzy, then you play Double Yatzy. And if you win Double Yatzy, then you play Triple Yatzy.

The winner of Triple Yatzy wins the challenge.
